## Positioner.getPosition() method

Calculate and return a new position (only called when `hasChanged` and `isActive` return true)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPosition(params: GetPositionParams<GExtension>): Position;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>GetPositionParams&lt;GExtension&gt;</code> |  |
